tagline: Builds production backends on Supabase — fast development, proper RLS, type-safe clients.
pros: Deep Supabase and PostgreSQL expertise — knows the platform and what's underneath
Security-first approach with thorough RLS policy design
Fast development velocity without sacrificing production practices
Handles auth, storage, realtime, and Edge Functions across the full Supabase stack
cons: Supabase-specific — less useful for non-Supabase backends
Doesn't build frontends or manage infrastructure beyond Supabase
Honest about when projects outgrow Supabase — may recommend migration
